thread.title: adidas’ Newest EQT Support ADV Boasts a Comfy Primeknit Upper
thread.title_full: adidas’ Newest EQT Support ADV Boasts a Comfy Primeknit Upper

author: Marcus Cho
title: adidas’ Newest EQT Support ADV Boasts a Comfy Primeknit Upper
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
adidas’ EQT Support Adv silhouette has already released in a medley of colorways, ranging from a more subtle black/green color combination to a bold royal blue iteration .
Now, the Three Stripes is incorporating its Primeknit technology into the silhouette’s build. Dubbed the “Core Black/Turbo” silhouette, the new colorway will also feature a pink stripe on the pulltab for a mild hit of flavor, while the same color also makes an appearance on the outsole’s heel.
The new colorway has already dropped and sold out at UBIQ , but you can definitely expect it to drop soon at select adidas Originals retailers for a retail price of $140 USD.
